title: The Writer's Almanac for Tuesday, May 17, 2022
description: Today would have been the 83rd birthday of Gary Paulsen, author of “Hatchet,” who died in October of last year.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today would have been the 83rd birthday of Gary Paulsen, author of “Hatchet,” who died in October of last year.
